meanings.definition: Relating to or suffering from excessive drinking or eating.
meanings.sent1: After the party, he felt crapulous from all the food and drinks.
meanings.sent2: She woke up feeling crapulous after eating too much cake at the birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The crapulous feeling after the feast made him regret not pacing himself.
meanings.sent4: The buffet left a crapulous aftermath in his stomach, like a storm of overindulgence.
meanings.sent5: The crapulous sensation lingered, a reminder of the feast's excess.

meanings.definition: Feeling sick or ill as a result of excessive indulgence in food or drink.
meanings.sent1: Eating too many sweets made her feel crapulous and queasy.
meanings.sent2: He became crapulous after consuming too much soda at the party.
meanings.sent3: The crapulous sensation in her stomach was a warning against overeating.
meanings.sent4: The junk food left him feeling crapulous, like a ship lost at sea.
meanings.sent5: The crapulous aftermath of the feast was a harsh lesson in moderation.
